{{Wired embedded system |brand=Intel |model=Galileo |revision=Board |upc=735858283236 |ean=5032037064330 |asin=B00K53CQK4 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (06/19/2017) |price=69 |est_release_date=10/2013 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Quark |cpu1_model=X1000 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M8JP-125:G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated |serial=yes,, console port,, 3-pin audio jack |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip2_model=DP83848 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3V RS232 Transceiver;TI;MAX3232;;1;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection Array;On Semi;CM1230_02CP;;6;,,, 40-Bit I/O Expander w/11KB EEPROM;Cypress;CY8C9540A;;1;,,, 12-Bit High Speed 8-Channel ADC w/ Temperature Sensor;Analog Devices;AD7298;;1;,,, 1-Î© 2-Channel SPDT Analog Switch;TI;TS5A23159;;9;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051B;;1;,,, 3.6V 4A Integrated Load Switch w/ Controlled Turn-on;TI;TPS22920;;4;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;1;,,, 4.5-16V Synchronous Step Down Three DC/DC Converter w/ FET;TI;TPS652510;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC, Arduino expansion, SPI |stock_boot=Grub;0.97; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.7;Poky 9.0.2; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=98:4F:EE }} {{TagLine|Intel Galileo Board}} :[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/78919/intel-galileo-board.html Product page]
*[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intel_Galileo ''Intel Galileo'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/11/06/69-intel-gallileo-development-board-combines-x86-processor-and-arduino-compatibility/ ''$69 Intel Gallileo Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/intel-launches-arduino-compatible-galileo-board/ ''Arduino compatible Galileo SBC runs Linux'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel]]'' Quark X1000 @400MHz :Single-Core 32-bit X86 *Memory: 256MB (DRAM) DDR *Storage: 8MB NOR Flash, 11KB EEPROM, :and Micro SD Card (up to 32GB) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet Port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host, 1x micro USB 2.0 device port *Expansion: Arduino compatible headers *Power Source: 5V/1.2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Intel Galileo Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Intel Galileo Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
